alert.note: Alert for Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Toombs County through 700 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Johnson Corner, or 8 miles northeast of Plant Hatch, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, pea sized hail, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... English Eddy, New Branch and Johnson Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
